project.Title: The Vampire
project.ItemDescription:
New Class Mod, the Vampire, for Darkest Dungeon ================================================
This mod brings you the haemophiliac vampire as a new playable class in Darkest Dungeon.
Suck the blood of your ennemies and heal your team members by sharing yours. Be careful to not cause her death by her own abilities.
A mobile healer packed with strong abilities but beware of the drawbacks.
================================================
If you think there is a problem with this mod please tell me and I will try to resolve it. The art is in progress, it is a mix from and scorpiovaeden's and moirgane's art please take a look at their work :
scorpiovaeden : http://www.nexusmods.com/darkestdungeon/users/1630581/?tb=mods&pUp=1
moirgane : http://www.nexusmods.com/darkestdungeon/users/2208150/?tb=mods&pUp=1
================================================ Please take a look at my other mods!
